灎字的基本解释

灎
yàn
古同“滟”，水波荡动。

灎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《詳校篇海》以贍切］
亦作“灎1”。亦作“灔1”。亦作“灩1”。“滟1”的繁体字。
(1)水浮动貌。
(2)水盈溢貌。
(3)指盈溢。
(4)水光耀貌。

灎字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灎； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页663第09
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?以贍切，音艷。瀲灎，水動貌。【木華·海賦】浟湙瀲灎。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?以冉切，音琰。義同。或作淊淡。　本作?。又作灎。俗作灧。

灎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
灎字的起名意思

暂无。

灎
Basic explanation of words
灎
yàn
Gu Tong "Yan", the water is turbulent.
灎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Detailed School Pianhai" is cut by support]
Also known as "灎1". Also known as "None 1". Also known as "Yan 1". Traditional characters for "滟1".
(1) The appearance of water floating.
(2) Water overflowing appearance.
(3) Refers to profit and overflow.
(4) Water is shining.
灎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　灎; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 663 No. 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Cut with 財, the sound is colorful. The water is beautiful and dynamic. 【Muhua·Haifu】Chaun 湙潋灎.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Yi Ran cut, Yin Yan. The same meaning. Or for flooding.　This work?. Also made. Vulgar.
